summary: An email from an associate warden at FCI Ray Brook to an unknown recipient, offering support and empathy based on the sender's experience as a PIO at Canaan when an inmate was killed. The email acknowledges the recipient is dealing with media and union during a difficult situation.

persons.name: Associate Warden (O) FCI Ra Brook
persons.role: Associate Warden (Operations) at FCI Ray Brook
persons.context: The sender of the email, who previously served as the Public Information Officer (PIO) at Canaan when an inmate was killed, offering support to the recipient.

events.title: Inmate death at Canaan
events.description: Reference to a past event where an inmate was killed at Canaan, where the sender served as PIO.

events.title: Email offering support
events.description: An associate warden sends an email offering support to an unknown recipient dealing with media and union during a difficult situation.

keyFacts: The sender is an associate warden at FCI Ray Brook with prior experience as a PIO at Canaan during an inmate death.
The email is sent to an unknown recipient who is an 'Exec and PIO' dealing with media and union during a difficult situation.
The email is dated August 14, 2019, and offers emotional support based on shared professional experience.
